tool.name: libraries
tool.command:
parsec libraries upload_file_from_server --library_id "$library_id" --server_dir "$server_dir"
#if $folder_id --folder_id "$folder_id" #end if #if $file_type --file_type "$file_type" #end if #if $dbkey --dbkey "$dbkey" #end if #if $link_data_only --link_data_only "$link_data_only" #end if #if $roles --roles "$roles" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

input.name: library_id
input.label: library_id
input.help: id of the library where to place the uploaded file

input.name: server_dir
input.label: server_dir
input.help: relative path of the subdirectory of ``library_import_dir`` to upload. All and only the files (i.e. no subdirectories) contained in the specified directory will be uploaded

input.name: folder_id
input.help: id of the folder where to place the uploaded files. If not provided, the root folder will be used

input.name: link_data_only
input.help: either 'copy_files' (default) or 'link_to_files'. Setting to 'link_to_files' symlinks instead of copying the files

tool.help: Upload all files in the specified subdirectory of the Galaxy library import directory to a library.
